description: This file defines a set of functions acting as a client API for the NoteMaster frontend application. It provides functions to interact with a backend REST API, including user registration, login, fetching user profile, managing notes (fetch, create, update, delete).

methods.name: registerUser({ username, email, password })
methods.description: Registers a new user with username, email, and password; returns user info or throws error.

methods.name: loginUser({ username, password })
methods.description: Logs in a user with username and password; returns tokens or throws error.

methods.name: fetchProfile(token)
methods.description: Retrieves the current user's profile data.

methods.name: fetchNotes(token, { q, sort, limit } = {})
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes, with optional search, filter, and sort parameters.

methods.name: createNote(token, { title, content })
methods.description: Creates a new note with title and content.

methods.name: updateNote(token, note_id, { title, content })
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by note_id with new title and content.

methods.name: deleteNote(token, note_id)
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

ctags.name: fetchNotes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function fetchNotes(token, { q, sort, limit } = {}) {$/

ctags.name: registerUser
ctags.pattern: /^export async function registerUser({ username, email, password }) {$/

ctags.name: updateNote
ctags.pattern: /^export async function updateNote(token, note_id, { title, content }) {$/
